about_the_game:
💖"Fall in love with me!"💖

You run a slow and steady bakery 🍞
It's not super popular, but you can't help but notice how cool the customers are🥺💖
The mean, but soft-hearted food critic. . . 🍽
The shy delivery person. . . 🥚
My childhood friend. . . 👀
And the cool and mysterious detective. . . 🔍

How can I choose?? 💗

Play as the new bakery owner in town! Make a name for yourself as you interact with these charming new characters! Or perhaps. . . familiar faces?

In this point-and-click visual novel, romance or befriend four lovable characters as you uncover the mysteries of the town you've moved into! Interact with the townsfolk on your days off and explore the town from Bonnie's Bakery in an exciting new way! Use your phone to interact with the love interests and play fun mini-games with them to earn more affection!

This game features many heart-throbbing things, such as:
  • Four love interests to romance!
  • A town to explore through the map!
  • Cute hand-drawn art!
  • Unlockable CGs!
  • Fun ways to interact with your love interests!
  • Several thrilling mysteries to investigate!
  • Multiple endings!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.12
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
